aspects.name: Aspect of Zagreus
aspects.description:
The form in which the eternal spear first revealed itself.

Its shape reflects its bearer's true self, hiding its own all the while.
aspects.cost:
1 / 1 / 1 / 1 / 1

Titan Blood

(Total: 5)

aspects.name: Aspect of Achilles
aspects.description:
After your Special, you can retrieve your Spear with Raging Rush.

The greatest of the Greeks was peerless in battle, up close and from afar.
aspects.upgrade:
Post-Rush Bonus Damage

(+50% / +75% / +100% / +125% / +150%)

for next 4 Attacks / Casts

  • Not listed: decrease Special range by 10%
aspects.cost:
1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5

Titan Blood

(Total: 15)

aspects.name: Aspect of Hades
aspects.description:
Your Spin Attack becomes Punishing Sweep.

The god of the dead discarded the eternal spear for a larger counterpart.
aspects.upgrade:
Punishing Bonus Damage

(+30% / +60% / +90% / +120% / +150%)

for Attack / Special for 10 Sec.

Also increases Spin Attack radius
aspects.cost:
2 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5

Titan Blood

(Total: 16)
aspects.notes: Punishing Damage Bonus does NOT apply to Spin Attack

aspects.name: Aspect of Guan Yu
aspects.description:
You have the Frost Fair Blade*, but your life and healing are reduced.

A mighty general shall battle with unmatched ferocity to unite his people.
aspects.cost:
3 / 3 / 3 / 3 / 3

Titan Blood

(Total: 15)

upgrades.name: Extending Jab
upgrades.description: Your Attack has more range and deals +40% damage to distant foes.
upgrades.notes:
• Increases attack range by 40% (430 => 602)
  • Increases damage to foes farther than 475 away
  • The damage bonus is additive.

upgrades.name: Chain Skewer
upgrades.description: Your Special bounces to up to 7 foes, dealing +30% damage for each.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Exploding Launcher
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Guan Yu and Aspect of Achilles

upgrades.name: Vicious Skewer
upgrades.description: Your Special deals +50% damage; +50% Critical chance on recovery.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Exploding Launcher
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Guan Yu
  • The damage bonus is additive.

upgrades.name: Exploding Launcher
upgrades.description: Your Special is replaced with a shot that deals 50 damage in an area.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Chain Skewer or Vicious Skewer
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Achilles and Aspect of Guan Yu

upgrades.name: Massive Spin
upgrades.description: Your Spin Attack deals +125% damage and hits a larger area.
upgrades.notes:
• Increases damage radius of Spin Attack by 30%
  • Cannot be combined with Flurry Jab

upgrades.name: Quick Spin
upgrades.description: Your Spin Attack charges and recovers much faster.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Flurry Jab
  • New charge timing:
    • 1st stage removed
    • 2nd stage: 0.15s
    • 3rd stage: 0.30s

upgrades.name: Flurry Jab
upgrades.description: Hold Attack to strike rapidly, but you cannot Spin Attack.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Flaring Spin, Massive Spin or Quick Spin
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Hades and Aspect of Guan Yu

upgrades.name: Charged Skewer
upgrades.description: Hold Special to charge your skewer for up to +200% base damage.

upgrades.name: Serrated Point
upgrades.description: Your Dash-Strike hits 3 times, but your dash has -25% range.

upgrades.name: Flaring Spin
upgrades.description: Charging your Spin Attack makes you Sturdy and pulse 40 damage.

upgrades.name: Triple Jab
upgrades.description: Your Attack strikes 3 times in a spread pattern.

upgrades.name: Winged Serpent
upgrades.description: Your Frost Fair Blade Spin Attack travels for +80% longer.
